name: Junior's Revenge
description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey as Junior, the king of the new world order. Witness his immense power and uncover the dark secrets of his past that allowed him to step into immeasurable power and influence. Many unbelievable twists and turns await you on this journey through time and space. Will you achieve ultimate power through ultimate sacrifice?

Mobile controls are supported at this time, but we recommend playing on a computer or any device with a keyboard.

This game is currently supported in the most recent version of the following web browsers:

Google Chrome

Microsoft Edge

Mozilla FireFox

Safari

Opera
